summary:
Coca-Cola, or Coke, is a popular soda made by The Coca-Cola Company. It was created in the 1800s by John Pemberton and later sold to Asa Candler, who made it very successful. Coke is sold in over 200 countries, and people drink billions of servings every day. It's one of the most valuable brands worldwide.

The secret recipe includes coca leaves and kola nuts. The company makes the concentrate, which is then mixed with water and sweeteners by bottlers. Diet Coke and other variations are also available.
title: Coca-Cola
